attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I PROPOSE THAT THE PRIME MINISTER OR WHOEVER! SHOULD CREATE A NATIONAL LOTTERY FOR ALL THOSE THAT WORK AND PAY NATIONAL INSURANCE CONTRIBUTIONS.THE PROJECT SHOULD COST NO MORE THAN £1/WEEK GAURANTIED FOR 20 YEARS i e (NO ANNUAL RISES). THE PRIZES SHOULD BE TO THE VALUE OF £200,000? EACH FOR AS MANY PEOPLE AS POSSIBLE. FOR THIS ALL WINNERS MUST AGREE TO BE TAKEN OFF THE BENIFITS LIST FOR 12 MONTHS? ( EXCLUDING MAJOR COST MEDICAL CARE )THIS WOULD GIVE THE WORKING MAN A LITTLE HOPE! GOD KNOWS HE NEEDS IT. THE COMBINATIONS OF APPLYING THIS SYSTEM ARE LIMITLESS AND VERY VARIED. I AM OBVIOUSLY BIAS TO MY OPINION BUT I DO THINK SOMETHING LIKE THIS WOULD MAKE A RATHER NICE CHANGE TO THE REGULAR DOOM AND GLOOM 
                      REGARDS D LANE

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action, not your name. Also please avoid the excessive use of block capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
